trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_00<tab>Krile has regained some composure.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_01<tab>As fate would have it, Krile has been reunited with her mother and father, Alayla and Robor. While uncertain how she should interact with her long-lost parents, with your support and encouragement, she sets off for the heatwells to make the most of this chance to be with them.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_02<tab>Krile and her parents' initial attempts to get acquainted prove awkward. As you observe their struggles, inspired by her experiences with xibruq pibil, Wuk Lamat offers to bring them food in a bid to break the ice. Alayla requests something cold, and you turn to your comrades to discuss options.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_03<tab>As this is a special moment, it is decided that you will look for a treat that will leave an impression. The search begins with asking locals for recommendations, and you make your way to leynode pyro to question the Endless there.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_04<tab>The answers you receive point you to a stall southwest of the leynode, which apparently offers something called gold star ice cream. Without delay, you set forth in search of it.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at the stall to find Wuk Lamat also eyeing it. The ice cream looks duly impressive if cumbersome, but confident in your transporting skills, you volunteer to deliver all three servings to Krile and her parents.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_06<tab>You have picked up the servings of gold star ice cream. Stepping quickly but lightly, you begin making your way back to Opal Springs.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_07<tab>You deliver the ice cream intact, but even with the delightful treats, the awkward air persists between Krile and her parents. Thankfully, the ice is finally broken when G'raha Tia makes an artful intervention, and genuine smiles manifest upon the faces of all present.
At the meal's conclusion, Krile's parents tell you about interdimensional fusion. The key for invoking the power is a relic that belonged to their people, the Milalla, who employed it in the distant past to flee to another reality when a great calamity froze their homeland. When lightning then threatened this world, Robor and Alayla attempted to invoke the power once more, but were unable to do so. In desperation, they agreed to cooperate with Preservation only to discover that the order sought to siphon aether from other worlds. This led to the couple's defection, and in the course of fleeing pursuit, they brought their only daughter to the Source to keep her safe. So it is that Krile comes to know the truth of her origin, and in order to learn more about the Milalla, you decide to visit the cavern inside the volcano, where their ancient homeland has been recreated.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SEQ_08<tab>Standing at the entrance to the cavern, Krile expresses her heartfelt gratitude to you all. Thanks to your intervention, she was able to not only bond with her parents, but know the joy of sharing a meal with them besides.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_01<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_02<tab>Gather information at leynode pyro.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the ice cream vendor.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the gold star ice cream to Krile.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_001<tab>To think that Krile would actually meet her parents...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_005<tab>Miracles really do happen here... I'm happy for Krile.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_010<tab>Alright. I feel a little calmer now.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_011<tab>I thought myself prepared for the possibility, but to actually come face-to-face with my parents was overwhelming.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_012<tab>And having been parted from them as an infant, I'm not sure how to behave...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_013<tab>Take your time. After everything that has happened, you deserve to do so.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_014<tab>You have many things to say to one another. Now you can say them.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>Indeed. This is a meeting to be cherished. Just do what comes natural, eh?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_016<tab>Thank you, everyone. I'll make the most of our time together...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>Let us keep an eye on things for now.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>You could carve the tension with a knife...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_030<tab>You're all our daughter's friends, yes? Thank you for bringing her to us.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ROBOR_000_035<tab>That we should meet our daughter again here of all places...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_040<tab>It's such a strange feeling to be reunited with you beyond death...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_041<tab>Your companions─what are they called?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_042<tab>Oh dear, I'd completely forgotten to introduce them!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_043<tab>Over here is Wuk Lamat, Vow of Resolve of Tuliyollal. Beside her is G'raha Tia, my colleague in the Students of Baldesion.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_044<tab>And this is <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, an adventurer─though that hardly does <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> justice. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> is the most dependable of friends, to whom I owe my life.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_045<tab>My word. We clearly have a great deal of thanks to give. Don't we, dear?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ROBOR_000_046<tab>Oh, uh...yes! Yes, we do! Our heartfelt gratitude to you all.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_047<tab>Not the smoothest of beginnings, is it...?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_048<tab>If only we had some xibruq pibil to ease the way, am I right?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_049<tab>Wait... That's not a bad idea.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>Hey, are you hungry? We could bring you something to eat if you like?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ROBOR_000_051<tab>Oh...uh, thank you, but we're fine.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_052<tab>You know, it's quite hot here by the springs.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_053<tab>Something cold would be lovely.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_054<tab>Understood! We'll fetch you all treats that'll help cool you off!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_055<tab>I wouldn't want to be a bother, but...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_056<tab>Think nothing of it. This is what friends are for.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_057<tab>Thank you. We shall look forward to the cool treats.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>As we've learned, good food brings people together─even sworn foes!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_065<tab>You're very considerate.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ROBOR_000_070<tab>I feel like a bundle of nerves...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_075<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We look forward to seeing what you bring.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_080<tab>That was well conceived, Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_081<tab>Hehe, just putting what I learned in Yak T'el to use.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_082<tab>If I had to mention a potential problem, however, it is that food here tastes like nothing to the living.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_083<tab>Seriously!? I had no idea...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_084<tab>Still, it appears to be perfectly enjoyable for the Endless. In going along with the idea, Krile likely understands this.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_085<tab>It may not instantly break the ice, but I'm hopeful that it will help to thaw it.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_086<tab>So, shall we split up and look for what Alayla requested? Something cold, ironically.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_087<tab>This is supposed to be a special moment, so I say we go with the best treat there is─one that'll leave an impression! The locals ought to be able to recommend something.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_088<tab>If you wanted to ask people near the aetheryte, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, G'raha Tia and I will do the same elsewhere.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSA04954_000_090<tab>Hm-hm, what snack to have today...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSA04954_000_091<tab>Eh? You want a recommendation for something tasty and cold? This stall doesn't have that sort of thing, I'm afraid.

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSA04954_000_092<tab>But speaking of something cold, I could use an iced drink with my snack. I think I'll get a coffee. Actually, a tea might be better, or even a lemonade...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSA04954_000_093<tab>Ah, but I can't go past a beer! Yes, let's make it a white beer today.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSA04954_000_095<tab>Actually, a dark one might be better. Or would it...?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSB04954_000_100<tab>A cold treat that will leave an impression? That's a difficult one.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSB04954_000_101<tab>Asyle Volcane is home to fighters, so the food here is mostly the hearty and filling kind...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSB04954_000_102<tab>Ah, right! There's a popular stall to the southwest that might just have what you're after. Why don't you go and take a look?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSB04954_000_105<tab>I've been curious about that stall myself, but I haven't checked it out yet. It could be just the thing, though.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSC04954_000_110<tab>Whew... After a long, hot soak like that, I'm going to need a gold star ice cream.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSC04954_000_111<tab>What? You don't know gold star ice cream? It's only the most popular treat here in Asyle Volcane!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSC04954_000_112<tab>While it's a little tricky to tuck into, you can't come here and not try it. There's a stall just to the southwest, so you have no excuses!

TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ASYLEVENDLESSC04954_000_115<tab>You'll understand when you see the ice cream, but you need to handle it with care. Wouldn't want to have all that delicious goodness become a puddle on the ground!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SYSTEM_000_116<tab>Based on what you learned from the locals, the stall to the southwest seems promising.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ICECREAMCLERK04954_000_118<tab>Hello there! Would you care for our famous gold star ice cream?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_120<tab>Heh, so you're here too. Everyone I spoke with recommended gold star ice cream.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_121<tab>Those colorful balls stacked on top of each other─that'd be the ice cream, I take it?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_122<tab>I can see the appeal, but it's going to be hard to deliver it intact. We need three servings, so let's get G'raha to help carry one.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_A1_000_001<tab>Just leave it to me!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_A1_000_002<tab>You're talking to a transportation expert.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_123<tab>You mean you can do it alone!?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_124<tab>Well, there do seem to be vessels for carrying three... Are you sure about this?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_125<tab>Great. They're definitely safer in your hands than in mine.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_126<tab>I'll go and tell G'raha everything's taken care of. See you back at the springs!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ICECREAMCLERK04954_000_130<tab>Hello there! Would you care for our famous gold star ice cream?
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ICECREAMCLERK04954_000_131<tab>Alright, three servings coming right up!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ICECREAMCLERK04954_000_132<tab>Here you are! You'll want to be quick so it doesn't melt, but also careful so it doesn't collapse. Good luck, and enjoy!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SYSTEM_000_133<tab>Deliver the ice cream to Krile before the time runs out.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SYSTEM_000_134<tab>You will have two minutes and five seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ICECREAMCLERK04954_000_138<tab>Oh dear, the ice cream has collapsed, has it? Not to worry, I'll fix it for you!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_140<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We look forward to seeing what you bring.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_SYSTEM_100_140<tab>Speak with the ice cream vender and deliver the ice cream to Krile before the time runs out.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_141<tab>Goodness me, what an amazing-looking treat! Thank you so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_WUKLAMAT_000_145<tab>That went really well! And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─your sense of balance is something else!
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_GRAHATIA_000_150<tab>Though it had no taste, the ice cream was a treat for the eyes. I'm glad it served to ease the tension.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ALAYLA_000_155<tab>You all have good hearts. Our daughter is fortunate to have friends like you.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_ROBOR_000_160<tab>You've gone through much trouble for us.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_170<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Raha, Lamaty'i...
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_171<tab>With your help, I was able to not only bond with my parents, but know the joy of sharing a meal with them besides.
TEXT_KINGMF109_04954_KRILE_000_172<tab>For that, and so much else, I thank you.
